mapper.update:
update JO_TASK
JO_ID = #{joId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TASK_STATUS = #{joTaskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TASK_TIME = #{joTaskTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JO_TASK_ACCEPT_TIME = #{joTaskAcceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JO_TASK_NEXT_TIME = #{joTaskNextTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEAL_GROUP_ID = #{dealGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_GROUP = #{dealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_PERSON_ID = #{dealPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_PERSON_NAME = #{dealPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECOND_DEAL_GROUP = #{secondDealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_DEAL_GROUP = #{backDealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_DEAL_PERSON = #{backDealPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TASK_CONTENT = #{joTaskContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TASK_ANNEX_ID = #{joTaskAnnexId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JO_TASK_TIME_LENGTH = #{joTaskTimeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = VERSION + 1
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update JO_TASK set JO_ID = #{joId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TASK_STATUS = #{joTaskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TASK_TIME = #{joTaskTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JO_TASK_ACCEPT_TIME = #{joTaskAcceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JO_TASK_NEXT_TIME = #{joTaskNextTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_GROUP_ID = #{dealGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_GROUP = #{dealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_PERSON_ID = #{dealPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_PERSON_NAME = #{dealPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECOND_DEAL_GROUP = #{secondDealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_DEAL_GROUP = #{backDealGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_DEAL_PERSON = #{backDealPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TASK_CONTENT = #{joTaskContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TASK_ANNEX_ID = #{joTaskAnnexId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JO_TASK_TIME_LENGTH = #{joTaskTimeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.sql: jo.ID, jo.AG_ID, jo.AG_NAME, jo.BUS_ID, jo.BUS_NUM, jo.PALTFORM_NUM, jo.PLATFORM_NAME, jm0.jo_key_name as JO_TOP_KEY_NUM, jm1.jo_key_name as JO_FIRST_KEY_NUM, jm2.jo_key_name as JO_SECOND_KEY_NUM, jm3.jo_key_name as PRIORITY_LEVEL, jo.LAUNCH_TIME, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_ID, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_NAME, jo.LAUNCH_PERSON_EMAIL, jo.LAUNCH_BRANCH_ID, jo.LAUNCH_BRANCH_NAME, jo.ACCEPT_GROUP_CODE, jo.ACCEPT_GROUP, jo.ACCEPT_NOW_GROUP, jo.DEAL_TIME_START, jo.DEAL_TIME_END, jo.DEAL_TIME_LENGTH, jo.JO_PROGRESS, jt.id as joTaskId, jt.jo_task_status as joTaskStatus, jt.jo_task_time as joTaskTime, jt.jo_task_accept_time as joTaskAcceptTime, jt.deal_person_id as joDealPersonId, jt.deal_person_name as joDealPersonName
mapper.select:
select
from JO_TASK jt left join JO_ORDER jo on jo.id = jt.jo_id left join jo_key_manage jm1 on jm1.id = jo.jo_first_key_num left join jo_key_manage jm0 on jm0.id = jm1.jo_key_back_num left join jo_key_manage jm2 on jm2.id = jo.jo_second_key_num left join jo_key_manage jm3 on jm3.id = jo.priority_level LEFT JOIN (select m1.jo_key top_key, m2.jo_key first_key, m3.jo_key second_key, m1.jo_key_name || '-' || m2.jo_key_name || '-' || m3.jo_key_name as order_type from JO_KEY_MANAGE m1 left join JO_KEY_MANAGE m2 on m2.JO_KEY_BACK_NUM = m1.jo_key left join jo_key_manage m3 on m3.jo_key_back_num = m2.jo_key where m1.jo_key_type = '0') ot ON ot.second_key = jo.jo_second_key_num
